name: react-agent
description: This template showcases a [ReAct agent](https://arxiv.org/abs/2210.03629) implemented using [LangGraph.js](https://github.com/langchain-ai/langgraphjs), designed for [LangGraph Studio](https://github.com/langchain-ai/langgraph-studio). ReAct agents are uncomplicated, prototypical agents that can be flexibly extended to many tools.
